name: NEW!  RASTA  BEANIE
description:
New Hat available for upcoming Winter Season.  This one is all white with true Rasta colors, green, gold, red and black,  made of acrylic yarn. Can be set on your head a number of ways. Large to tuck those dreads in. Hand wash, air dry for lasting quality.

 
Your favorite main color  can be custom ordered and available within a few days in most cases. Contact us if this is your wish.

name: NETTED DREAD HAT
description: Net-type hat, for those warmer days.  Crocheted of medium wash jean-blue multi acrylic.  Hand wash and dry for lasting quality.

name: LARGER DREAD TAM
description: This dread tam is a little heavier, a little larger for those with longer dreads, perfect for those cooler days and cooler climes.  Crocheted with Chartreuse and Brown acrylic yarns.  Can be machine washed, tho hand washing and air dry will preserve the quality.

name: NEW!  DREADED SPORTS BEANIE
description:
New Shades for the fall sports season.  This one featured is in the Philadelphia Eagles colors, teal green, black white and silver, made of acrylic yarn. Can be set on your head a number of ways. Large  to tuck those dreads in. Hand wash, air dry for lasting quality.

Also available in reverse color of All White with teal, black, silver stripe.  

Your favorite team colors can be custom ordered and available within a few days in most cases.  Contact us if this is your wish.

name: THE DREADED BEANIE
description: This multi-functional beanie style crochet hat, is light gold with brown, made of acrylic yarn.  Can be set on your head a number of ways.  Great to tuck those dreads in.   Hand wash, air dry for lasting quality.
